summary.div: Important Deprecated. This API may be removed from future releases of Windows. Applications should use the Media Session for playback.
summary.para: Contains flags that describe a media item.

member.name: _MFP_MEDIAITEM_CHARACTERISTICS.MFP_MEDIAITEM_IS_LIVE
member.summary: The media item represents a live data source, such as video camera. If playback is stopped and then restarted, there will be a gap in the content.

member.name: _MFP_MEDIAITEM_CHARACTERISTICS.MFP_MEDIAITEM_CAN_SEEK
member.summary: The media item supports seeking. If this flag is absent, the method will fail.

member.name: _MFP_MEDIAITEM_CHARACTERISTICS.MFP_MEDIAITEM_CAN_PAUSE
member.summary: The media item can pause. If this flag is absent, the method will likely fail.

member.name: _MFP_MEDIAITEM_CHARACTERISTICS.MFP_MEDIAITEM_HAS_SLOW_SEEK
member.summary: Seeking can take a long time. For example, the source might download content through HTTP.
